questions.question: Who would earn more money for a 2-hour babysitting job?

choices.answer: They would earn the same amount

choices.answer: They would earn the same amount

questions.question: If both babysitters started working at the same time, who would be the first to earn $25?

choices.answer: They would earn the same amount

questions.question: If both babysitters started working at the same time, who would be the first to earn $50?

choices.answer: They would earn the same amount

choices.answer: Any job that is exactly 3.63 hours

questions.question: In general, what is true for the point at which the two graphs intersect?

choices.answer: Both relationships have the same x and y value.
Both relationships have the same x but different y values.
Both relationships have the same y but different x values.
Both relationships have different x and y values.
